Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing notice to the state concerning disciplinary proceedings against certain professionals.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing notice to the state concerning disciplinary proceedings against certain professionals.

Items.Title: to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of buildings to post on its website the number of fatalities and accidents at construction sites.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Department of buildings to report the number of fatalities and accidents at construction sites.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing notice to the state concerning disciplinary proceedings against certain professionals.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing notice to the state concerning disciplinary proceedings against certain professionals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing notice to the state concerning disciplinary proceedings against certain professionals.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
